title: Textile, ca. 1815
medium: Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.
inscribed: On a rock near th center, "Delmes sculpsit'.
dimensions:
Warp: 232 cm (91in.)
Weft: 83cm (32 3/4in.) (Both selvedges present).
Height of repeat: 47.5cm (18 3/4in.)
description: Four scenes, all captioned in French, showing travelers on the road. The captions are: 'Route de St. Cloud', 'Route de Poissy', 'Les Joueurs des Boules', 'Le Joueur de Cornemuse'.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1815.
ca. 1815. Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-173.
